name: Color is the Key
description:
"Color is the Key" is a small game created by me as an entry for "Mini Jam 111: Colors".

Solving puzzles, destroying walls, combining colors to create new ones...But as always, there is a small catch.

It can't be that simple, right?

Colors are meant to be...colorful.

But...do they need to be?

Hope you can all enjoy this small game! Feel free to leave comments about how your playthrough went!

Controls:
WSAD - Movement
E - Interaction
R - Reload level
LMB - Shoot
ESC - Quit application
